text: Xinshimen a! Nimen zai [chaojin] shoujie qijian buke da sha liewu. Nimen zhong shei guyi da sha liewu, qi fa shu shi xian chu yu suo da sha de liewu xiangdang de shengchu [niu yang tuo deng], you nimen zhong de liang wei gongzheng ren dui ci shending hou, zuowei xisheng wu song dao ke er bai [xian sheng], huo gong pinmin chi huo yi xiangdang de zhaijie shuzui, yibian ta changshi ziji xingwei de houguo. An la kuanshu guoqu suo fan de zui'e. Shei zaifan, an la bi yancheng shei. An la shi quanneng de, zhangguan baoying de.
